page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RANGZEB
page.content:
I woke up at 7.30 and I had corn- flakes for breakfast. I went to school by bus. Our first lesson was set{English.} Then we had play time followed by{Physical Education. } For lunch I had{Halal meat,}mashed potatoes and cake. After lunch we had {Environmental Studies}all afternoon. We had an indoor play time because of the rain. I walked home.
After my tea I went to the mosque to read the{Quran.} The{Quran}is the {Holy Book of Muslims.} When I came back I had my chappaties. I went out to play marbles. Marbles are solid, small round balls made out of glass. I went in and read a book about prehistoric animals. I went to sleep at 9.30.
